phrases: The interior of this store is currently undergoing renovations.
This floor will be closed for the duration.
The burden is too great for her to bear alone.
She is probably at her limit already.
The moment you give up, it is all over.
However, you can change your fate.
All the power you were blessed with was meant for this moment.
Can someone like me really do that much?
Can I really change this outcome?
That is why you should make a contract with me...
As if I met her in a dream...
As if I met her in a dream...
You should give him a hand.
How is it been going lately?
Guys who do not even have the courage to confess are not worth your time.
She is still using homeroom to talk about her boyfriend.
This week is her three month anniversary.
This is a really crucial time.
If he is not for real, this is around the time problems start to arise.
If she can make it past this, she should be fine for another year or so.
Is not it a little flashy?
It would be all over if a woman was judged only by her looks.
This way Madoka's secret admirers will all be mesmerised.
You have to pretend that you have some.
It is the secret of beauty.
Make sure you eat it all.
Would you like another cup of coffee?
That is a really cute ribbon.
It looks very nice on you.
And then she said that guys who use love letters instead of confessing in-person are not worth the trouble.
Madoka's mom is always so cool, and she is beautiful and career-minded to boot.
If we could be like that, we would not have anything to worry about.
I would not mind receiving one myself.
Does Madoka want to become a popular beauty like Hitomi?
Were you perhaps trying to change your image with that ribbon?
So you have learned the secret to becoming popular from your mom.
Are not you a cute one?
But I definitely will not forgive you for trying to get popular with the guys.
Madoka is to become my bride!
Today, I have something very important to announce.
It is fine either way, is not it?
Judging a woman's charm by the way she prepares eggs is a grave error!
To all you girls, be careful never to date guys who only eat soft-boiled eggs.
Looks like things did not work out, huh?
And as for you guys, make sure you do not become the sort of person who nitpicks about things like eggs.
Allow me to introduce a new transfer student!
Okay, let us have you introduce yourself.
It is nice to meet you all.
What school did you come from, Akemi-san?
I attended a missionary school in Tokyo.
What brand of shampoo do you use?
That Akemi-san sure has a mysterious air about her.
Do you know her from somewhere?
It seemed like she was looking right at you just now.
I think all the excitement has gotten to me.
Pardon me, but I would like to go to the nurse's office.
Let me show you where it is.
I do not want to cause you any trouble.
I will ask the person on duty.
Kaname Madoka, you are the nurse's representative for this class, correct?
Could you accompany me to the nurse's office?
How did you know I am the health representative?
Well, the nurse's room is just
It is this way, is not it?
Is it possible that you already know where it is?
Th-That is a pretty unique name, is not it?
I did not mean it was weird or anything.
I think it sounds kind of cool...
Kaname Madoka, do you truly value your life?
Do you value your friends and family?
They are all very important to me.
Just continue living the life of Kaname Madoka.
Just as it always has been.
Did she just break the school record?
I thought she was perfect, good in sports and academics.
But it turns out she is really nuts.
How many things must she excel in before she is satisfied?!
Madoka-san, is this really the first time you have met Akemi-san?
What is that supposed to mean?
Did you meet her under some strange circumstances before?
I think I saw her in a dream last night.
I was really worried about it.
It must be something from a past life.
You two are destined companions who have traversed time and space to meet again.
What kind of dream was it?
I do not really remember it.
I just know that it was really weird.
It might be that you really have met Akemi-san before.
Is not that a little far-fetched?
It might just be a coincidence.
Was it piano today, or Japanese dance?
But exams are creeping up, so I do not know how long I can keep doing it.
Man, it must be nice being part of a middle-class family.
Madoka, is it all right if we go by the CD store on our way home?
The interior of this store is currently undergoing renovations.
This floor will be closed for the duration.
How can you be so cruel?
This has nothing to do with you.
I heard his cries for help.
Is she some kind of cosplaying freak?
By the way, what is that thing?
It is not a stuffed animal, right?
But I still have to save him.
What the hell is going on here?!
But it is all right now.
Oh, you were able to save Kyubei?
I could hear his voice inside my head.
So that is how it is.
You are from Mitagihara, I see.
Would you mind if I finished up here?
If you want to catch it, you would better hurry.
I will let you go this time.
There is something else I have to do.
You are not very bright, are you?
I am saying I will let you leave unharmed.
We are not looking for unnecessary trouble.
You should be thanking these two.
I just happened to pass by.
Were you the one who was calling me?
How do you know our names?
I have a request for both of you.
I want you to make a contract with me and become a Magical Girl!
I have the power to grant any wish.
I will grant any miracle, no matter what it is.
